summary: This tiny mod simply changes the brown woodelf eyes with blue ones, cause no option of vanilla woodelf-eyes has satisfied me.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
*********************************************
NayCom\'s blue-eyed Woodelf
*********************************************

About:
---------------------
This tiny mod simply replaces the original brown woodelf eyes with blue ones, cause no option of the vanilla woodelf-eyes has satisfied me.
This is my first published mod ever, so... if there\'ll be any problems, please contact me,  I\'m still learning ;) 

Installation:
---------------------
Extract the archive and copy the \"data\"-folder to your Skyrim installation folder
e.g
	steam\\steamapps\\skyrim\\
	program files\\skyrim\\
	x:\\skyrim\\
	etc.
or use the Nexus Mod-Manager

Uninstall:
---------------------
Delete the \"eyewoodelfdeepbrown.dds\"-file from your 
	\\skyrim\\data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\\ -folder
or use the NMM to get the deep brown vanilla eyes back!

How to use:
---------------------
Create a new char or open console (\"^\") and type showracemenu


Changelog 1.1
---------------------
After having some trouble with the 1.0-color (turned to green ingame for some reason) I just replaced the old .dds with a new one from the original .bsa.
Have fun!

If you like it leave a comment, if not you\'re free to move on :P
[/center]
author: NayCom
